topics.body:
Lucky Star ep3 impressions

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]Oh goddammit I'm already laughing, the uniform gag was very simple but very humorous XD 

by the way I just noticed Konata has a mole 

and the topic will always come back to food, won't it :P 

Konata really just doesn't give a crap about what she's doing in public does she? A̶l̶s̶o̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶ ̶m̶e̶ ̶X̶D̶ 

"I'M... out of comebacks" And then not even a minute later Kagami comes up with the best comeback so far 

KONATA HAS A NOSE... i mean more than usual 

PONYTAILS :D 

MOE-ISMS :D 

*scoot*[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

still good so far
